title: Plano comercial de Monterrey 1894 (Facísimil de 1995, Hoja 2)
author: Florentino Arroyo y Ramón Díaz
institutionalAuthor: Instituto Nacional de Estadística, Geografía e Informática
notes: This is Sheet 2 (Hoja 2) of a multi-sheet map series. Sheet 1 is map069. This is a 1995 reproduction/catalog of the original 1894 map.
